valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Tue 18 Nov 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Wed 19 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low west Scotland 1009 expected the netherlands 1000 by midday tomorrow

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, northerly 5 to 7, occasionally gale 8 at first. In east, northerly 4 to 6.
Sea state
In west, rough or very rough. in east, moderate or rough, occasionally very rough later.
Weather
In west, squally wintry showers, perhaps thundery. In east, wintry showers.
Visibility
In west, moderate, occasionally very poor. In east, good, occasionally poor.
